title: Eminem, Dolly Parton, Duran Duran to Join Rock & Roll Hall of Fame
sub_head: Pat Benatar, Eurythmics, Lionel Richie and Carly Simon also get in, while Beck, Kate Bush and A Tribe Called Quest are passed over
body:
The Rock & Roll Hall of Fame announced its latest inductees Wednesday, with Eminem, Dolly Parton, Duran Duran, Eurythmics, Carly Simon, Lionel Richie and Pat Benatar set to join the Cleveland institutionâ€™s pantheon.
The class of 2022 embraces the musical diversity of pop, including artists who span decades and genres, from rap to country. The induction ceremony is scheduled for Nov. 5 in Los Angeles.
